body_html: I was installing TensorFlow as part of setting up this neural style project. At some point while installing all the dependencies I did find that I needed to upgrade pip, as I was running pip 1.5.2. I upgraded it to pip 8.1.2. If a minimum pip version is required maybe add that to the Pip Installation documentation?
body_text: I was installing TensorFlow as part of setting up this neural style project.  At some point while installing all the dependencies I did find that I needed to upgrade pip, as I was running pip 1.5.2.  I upgraded it to pip 8.1.2.  If a minimum pip version is required maybe add that to the Pip Installation documentation?
body: I was installing TensorFlow as part of setting up [this neural style project](https://github.com/anishathalye/neural-style).  At some point while installing all the dependencies I _did_ find that I needed to upgrade pip, as I was running pip 1.5.2.  I upgraded it to pip 8.1.2.  If a minimum pip version is required maybe add that to the [Pip Installation](https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.11/get_started/os_setup.html#pip-installation) documentation?
